name: Láadan Helper
description:
Láadan is a 'feminist' constructed language, invented by the linguist Suzette Haden Elgin, in the 1980s.

Features

The Láadan Helper app contains a dictionary and other reference material for people who are interested in the constructed language. This includes:

  • English ↔ Láadan Dictionary (offline access)
  • Bookshelf of text stories for practicing the language (online required)
  • Phrase book (online required)
  • Word lists (online required)
  • Grammar reference (online required)
  • Links to additional resources
